caption.title: Maximum likelihood phylogeny of SIV/HIV env locus.
caption.p: SIVsm/HIV-2 lineages are green and their MRCA is designated with an open green star. SIVcpz/HIV-1 lineages are red and their MRCA is designated with a closed red star. All other SIV lineages are blue. Tree is midpoint rooted. Nodes with bootstrap support >80% are indicated with an asterisk.
